items.desc: Centers content along both axes. Commonly used for full-page loaders, hero sections, empty states, login forms, modal content, and maintenance screens.
Aligns content to the start of both axes. Useful for chat message layouts, top-aligned dashboard widgets, feeds, sidebars, and notification panels.
Aligns content to the end of both axes. Often used for sticky footer content, bottom-aligned CTA sections, chat input bars, and mobile action menus.
Distributes content with space between items. Common in headers with logos and actions, dashboard metric cards, pricing comparison grids, and calendar layouts.
Distributes content with space around items. Suitable for feature highlight sections, icon grids, marketing banners, and gallery previews.
Distributes content evenly with equal spacing. Frequently used in navigation menus, stats dashboards, mobile tab bars, and product feature grids.
